item.title: Kitten add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Kitten add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Kitten add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Kitten add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "Memories warm you up from the inside. But they also tear you apart." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Kitten add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "If you remember me, then I don't care if everyone else forgets." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Kitten add a quote by Jean Rhys
item.description: "Yes, I am sad, sad as a circus-lioness, sad as an eagle without wings, sad as a violin with only one string and that one broken, sad as a woman who is growing old. Sad, sad, sad..." -- Jean Rhys

item.title: Kitten add a quote by Jean Rhys
item.description: "Today I must be very careful, today I have left my armor at home." -- Jean Rhys

item.title: Kitten add a quote by Tupac Shakur
item.description: "I know it seems hard sometimes but remember one thing. Through every dark night, there's a bright day after that. So no matter how hard it get, stick your chest out, keep ya head up.... and handle it." -- Tupac Shakur

item.title: Kitten add a quote by Tupac Shakur
item.description: "You can spend minutes, hours, days, weeks, or even months over-analyzing a situation; trying to put the pieces together, justifying what could've, would've happened... or you can just leave the pieces on the floor and move the fuck on." -- Tupac Shakur

item.title: Kitten add a quote by Joseph Gordon-Levitt
item.description: "Your heart has a little empty corner. You won't even know I'm there -- I'll be very quiet." -- Joseph Gordon-Levitt

item.title: Kitten add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "We accept the love we think we deserve." -- Stephen Chbosky

item.title: Kitten add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "So, this is my life. And I want you to know that I am both happy and sad and I'm still trying to figure out how that could be." -- Stephen Chbosky

item.title: Kitten add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "Things change. And friends leave. Life doesn't stop for anybody." -- Stephen Chbosky

item.title: Kitten add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "She wasn't bitter. She was sad, though. But it was a hopeful kind of sad. The kind of sad that just takes time. " -- Stephen Chbosky

item.title: Kitten add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "Enjoy it. Because it's happening." -- Stephen Chbosky
